task.title: Create a Call Topic
task.shortdesc: Call Topics can be found on a related list on the Abstract Call Detail Page.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Call Topics related list.
Click on New Call Topic button
Enter the Display Name in text field

ul.li: Enable Access Permissions - when checked, staff user can identify active badge assignments that must be held to participate as submitter or a reviewer
Submission Form URL - displays URL through which portal users can access the abstract submission form.
Submission Dates - date range for making submissions
Review Dates - date range given to the reviewers to complete assignments
Submissions Field Set - API name of field set that defines the fields to be displayed on the submission form for this Call Topic
Author Field Set - API name fof the field set to gather details about the authors for this Call Topic
Reviewer Field Set- API name of field set used to capture details about the reviewer for this Call Topic
Reviewer Submission Field Set-API name of field set that defines the submission fields to be displayed to the reviewer
Submission Instructions Instructional text that will be displayed to the submitter about the review process and their responsibilities for this Call Topic
Review Instructions - Instructional text that will be displayed to the reviewer about the review process and their responsibilities for this Call Topic
